pageContext.claim: “We have trade with the EU -- and Germany being the biggest member. Very, very badly on trade. And we're negotiating with them on that, but right now I'm not satisfied with the deal they want to make. They've cost the United States hundreds of billions of dollars over the years on trade.”
pageContext.analysis: Countries do not make or lose money on trade deficits. The European Union, of which Germany is part, is one of the biggest trading partner for the United States.
